remarks: Conjunction in terms of disjunction (DeMorgan's law).  Theorem *4.5 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 120, but where the propositions are decidable.  The forward direction, ~ pm3.1 , holds for all propositions, but the equivalence only holds given decidability.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 21-Apr-2018.)
statement: anordc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( DECID ps -> ( ( ph /\ ps ) <-> -. ( -. ph \/ -. ps ) ) ) ) $.
